body:
@unclejack I did those tests you have suggested:

Program compiled with Go 1.4.2 and GOMAXPROCS set to 1 completed the same task in 1m20s
Program compiled with Go 1.5    and GOMAXPROCS set to 1 completed the same task in 1m46s

So there is still a difference, but much less than before when GOMAXPROCS was set to runtime.NumCPU().
